content:
Hey! There's a new online course coming up, starting early in January:

  • Applied Compositional Thinking for Engineers.
It's no coincidence that the acronym for "Compositional Thinking" is "CT".
It's probably no surprise but I am personally very excited about this :)
Yes, using "(applied) compositional thinking" as a less scary substitute for "(applied) category theory" is a good one. I'll have to remember that.
